scripts.dev:win: concurrently "vite" "cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && cmake --build build --config Debug && build/Debug/MikoIDE.exe"
scripts.build:cli:win: cd cli && zig build -Dtarget=x86_64-windows && copy zig-out/bin/mikoide.exe ../build/release/bin/mikoide.exe
scripts.build:cli:linux: cd cli && zig build -Dtarget=x86_64-linux && cp zig-out/bin/mikoide ../build/release/bin/mikoide
scripts.build:release:win: pip install -r script/requirements.txt && bun run build && xcopy dist app/assets /E /Y && cmd /c "C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Community/VC/Auxiliary/Build/vcvars64.bat" && python ./script/make.py build
scripts.build:release:linux: pip install -r script/requirements.txt && bun run build && cp -r dist/* app/assets && python3 ./script/make.py build
